typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Matching value LMDB} as string,
		{Matching value LMDB II} as string,
		{Site Ship To (char)} as string,
		Date as string,
		{Transaction Time} as string,
		{Transaction ID} as string,
		{Card Number} as string,
		{Transaction Value} as string,
		{Transaction Quantity} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
